title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions
OB: When using the application, the MRU (Most Recently Used) File List in the File menu does not retain the previously opened files between sessions. This can be observed by noting that the file list is empty when the application is started again after a shutdown.
EB: The MRU File List in the File menu should retain the previously opened files between sessions. When the application is restarted, the file list should display the files that were previously opened.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Start the application. 2. Open 2 or 3 files. 3. Shutdown the application. 4. Restart the application. 5. Observe that the previously opened files do not appear in the MRU File List in the File menu.
